snippet: In James Nares’s “STREET,” at the Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art in Hartford, silent Manhattan vignettes unfold to the sound of a jangling, droning acoustic guitar soundtrack.
abstract: James Nare video STREET, at the Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art in Hartford, shows familiar events in an unfamiliar way through the use of high-definition, slow-motion images (Metropolitan/Connecticut).
lead_paragraph: In James Nares’s “STREET,” at the Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art in Hartford, silent Manhattan vignettes unfold to the sound of a jangling, droning acoustic guitar soundtrack.

headline.seo: In James Nares’s ‘STREET,’ Taming the Galloping City
headline.main: A Galloping City Captured in Slow Motion
headline.print_headline: A Galloping City Captured in Slow Motion
